title: Dear You - Part 8
detail_text: <:th_ch0006/>….Everyone said some pretty embarrassing stuff, huh<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0206/>It’s not embarrassing~ They’re just being honest, you know?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0106/>Fuu…. Then, this Yohane will give you an example of a great message. Is the camera ready?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0206/>You’re good to go~<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0106/>Little demon, you’ve done well to be able to follow me thus far. For I, Yohane, will be the one to rule all of hell….<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0206/>As expected of Yoshiko-chan. You have big ambitions just like Setsuna-chan said~<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0106/>Geez! It’s not Yoshiko, it’s Yohane! ….*Sigh*, Ahem. Until Yohane obtains that enormous magical power, you may continue to serve by my side….<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0106/>Next is your turn, Maki<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0006/>What Yoshiko said was basically「Thank you for everything, I’ll be in your care from now on」<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0106/>Hey! Don’t twist my words!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0006/>Since she herself says that, the translation was probably accurate. You’re popular, huh. Well, I’m grateful to you too. We also get a lot of help from you, so. So, umm…. I’ll be in your care too<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0006/>It’s all yours, Kanata<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0206/>It’s Kanata~. The other two aren’t really honest with themselves, but they want you to a~lways be at their side cheering for them, you know~<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0006/>Don’t put words in my mouth!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0106/>Don’t put words in my mouth!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0206/>See, they’re in sync~. We’ve all become this close thanks to you. You’re the one connecting us all. So let’s continue to get along with e~veryone, okay♪ Also, please keep supporting Kanata from now on~<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0006/>Geez, don’t just say whatever you want….<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0106/>That’s right<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0206/>Nnfufu, Kanata knows~. You two are such good girls~ There there♪<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0000/>Translated by SIFAStheatre and Idol Story<:dt_line_end/>
